name: Fighting Frenzy: Swole Simulator
detailed_description:
Play as a Swolestafarian who is trying to get fit in this 2D game.

You start off at the training dojo with a voracious appetite and small muscles. As you play different minigames you will improve your stats depending on how well you perform. Once you feel confident with your stats or you are out of energy, challenge the AI to a fight.

The minigames are skill based or reaction time dependent. There are a few hidden secrets you will learn from playing these minigames that helps your character get extra swole. Each minigame will improve a different stat.

In 2 player mode, choose the character of your choice and battle it out on one of a dozen stages.

This game will improve over time based on your feedback. Leave some!
about_the_game:

In 2 player mode, choose the character of your choice and battle it out on one of a dozen stages.

short_description: Do your friends and family make fun of you for not being swole enough? Play Swole Simulator! Try it out, It's worth a goof and a gaff. Disclaimer: The only muscle mass you may gain from playing this game is in your fingers.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 8
  • Processor: Dual core Intel or AMD
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 11 graphics card w/ 1GB Video RAM
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 100 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Yes
  • Additional Notes: 1920 x 1080 resolution is best
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Quad core Intel or AMD
  • Memory: 4 MB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 11 graphics card w/ 2GB Video RAM
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 100 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Yes
  • Additional Notes: 1920 x 1080 resolution is best
